Title: Gates to Paradise
Writer: Jerzy Andrzejewski (screenplay), Donald Howarth (screenplay), Jerzy Andrzejewski (novel)
Actors: Lionel Stander, Ferdy Mayne, Mathieu Carrière, Pauline Challoner
Plot: Some children led a crusade in 1212 to free Jerusalem from Turkish authorities.Two main heroes Nicholas and Stephen use all their might to defeat the enemy.
